argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_snssi | |- ( A e. dom F -> { A } C_ dom F ) |
| 2 |  | #P_funimass3 | |- ( ( Fun F /\ { A } C_ dom F ) -> ( ( F " { A } ) C_ B <-> { A } C_ ( `' F " B ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( ( F " { A } ) C_ B <-> { A } C_ ( `' F " B ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( F ` A ) e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_snss | |- ( ( F ` A ) e. B <-> { ( F ` A ) } C_ B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- dom F = dom F |
| 7 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( F Fn dom F <-> ( Fun F /\ dom F = dom F ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_biimpri | |- ( ( Fun F /\ dom F = dom F ) -> F Fn dom F ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( Fun F -> F Fn dom F ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fnsnfv | |- ( ( F Fn dom F /\ A e. dom F ) -> { ( F ` A ) } = ( F " { A } ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> { ( F ` A ) } = ( F " { A } ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_sseq1d | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( { ( F ` A ) } C_ B <-> ( F " { A } ) C_ B ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( ( F ` A ) e. B <-> ( F " { A } ) C_ B ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_snssg | |- ( A e. dom F -> ( A e. ( `' F " B ) <-> { A } C_ ( `' F " B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( A e. ( `' F " B ) <-> { A } C_ ( `' F " B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 13, 15 | #P_3bitr4d | |- ( ( Fun F /\ A e. dom F ) -> ( ( F ` A ) e. B <-> A e. ( `' F " B ) ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ fvimacnv , based on ~ funimass3 .  If ~ funimass3 is ever proved directly, as opposed to using ~ funimacnv pointwise, then the proof of ~ funimacnv should be replaced with this one.  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
